secref.title: XI. The Folk and Its Law

subsec.title: Purposes
subsec.p: Not clear yet! Ultimately these notes on Sabine will be intended to help ground the writing of a volume on the practical side of "Positive Philosophy", but initially it provides some background for the more theoretical side.

section.title: I. The City State
section.abstract: This chapter provides background on the nature of the Greek city state aa a preliminary to discussing the political philosophies of Plato and Aristotle, which form part I of the book.

subsec.title: Political Ideals
subsec.p: In this section Sabine is talking about the development of political ideas prior to their systematic exposition in Plato and Aristotle.
